sentences.sentence: You and Aaron are to present your censers also.
sentences.translation: 你和亚伦也各拿自己的香炉。

sentences.sentence: This do; Take you censers, Korah, and all his company;
sentences.translation: 可拉阿，你们要这样行，你和你的一党要拿香炉来。

sentences.sentence: You, Korah, and all your followers are to do this: Take censers.
sentences.translation: 可拉啊，你们要这样行：你和你的一党要拿香炉来。
